name: Buzzkill (brittbrady)
description:
By Britt Brady and Cullen Dwyer

Welcome to Buzzkill. Momma is hungry and needs pollen, but has depression and won’t leave the hive. There are lots of bad bugs who want to hurt Momma. Collect pollen for her and deploy the troops to defend her while she sleeps.

Left Mouse Button: Drag to select units, click to interact / command

Right Mouse Button: Deselect units

Middle Mouse Button: Pan camera

Download: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/52/buzzkill
